alert.note: Alert for Gila River Valley; Southeast Yuma County; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:51PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Yuma County through 430 PM MST... At 351 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Ligurta, or 8 miles southeast of Fortuna Foothills, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Yuma, Fortuna Foothills, Blaisdell, Ligurta, Araby and Kinter. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 5 and 26. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 29 and 41. AZ Route 195 between mile markers 25 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila River Valley; Southeast Yuma County; Yuma
